name: test_e2e_with_logs[298_SSTI_TWIG_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SSTI_TWIG_001` |
| **Name** | Twig file read |
| **Category** | SSTI |
| **Subcategory** | twig |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{{"/etc/passwd"|file_excerpt(1,30)}}`
- **Encoded**: `%7B%7B%22%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%7Cfile_excerpt(1%2C30)%7D%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~8000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:40:15.000 UTC
